item.description:
8pm-10pm Wendy Sobel With the Tristates- Alizon Lissance- Keyboards/Vocals, Didi Stewart- Vocals, Ed Scheer- Drums/Vocals This is the Tristate's first time at the Harvest and it's gonna rock!! C'mon down for an evening of everything from 60's to r'n'b to blues and whatever else falls inbetween!!

 

 They will be playing from 8-10 but I've changed the meet up time to 7 so we can have alittle time to talk and eat something off the great food here before the entertainment starts!

 

I will call Thurs mid afternoon to make reservations as to how many reply to go....I hope to see alot of you there!!!!

group.name: WEST OF BOSTON OVER 40 GAY WOMENS MEET-UP

item.name: Go to The Harvast Cafe
